name: Drawer
description: The Drawer component is a Modal variation that appears as a side panel at any chosen side of the page.

props.name: containerPlacement
props.doc: Defines on what side the Drawer should be opened. Can be set to `left`, `right`, `top` and `bottom`. Defaults to `right`.

props.name: title
props.doc: The drawer title. Displays on the very top of the content.

props.name: minWidth
props.doc: The minimum Drawer content width, defined by a CSS width value like `50vw` (50% of the viewport). Be careful on using fixed `minWidth` so you don't break responsiveness. Defaults to `30rem` (average width is set to `60vw`).

props.name: maxWidth
props.doc: The maximum Drawer content width, defined by a CSS width value like `20rem`. Defaults to `60rem` (average width is set to `60vw`).

props.name: className
props.doc: Give the Drawer content a class name (maps to `dnb-drawer`).

props.name: spacing
props.doc: If set to `false` then the drawer content will be shown without any spacing. Defaults to `true`.

props.name: preventCoreStyle
props.doc: By default the drawer content gets added the core style class `dnb-core-style`. Use `false` to disable this behavior.

props.name: navContent
props.doc: The content which will appear in the navigation, above the header, and side-by-side the close button.

props.name: headerContent
props.doc: The content which will appear in the header of the drawer.

props.name: modalContent
props.doc: The content which will appear when triggering the drawer.

props.name: alignContent
props.doc: Define the inner horizontal alignment of the content. Can be set to `left`, `center`, `right` and `centered`. If `centered`, then the content will also be centered vertically. Defaults to `left`.

props.name: fullscreen
props.doc: If set to `true` then the drawer content will be shown as fullscreen, without showing the original content behind. Can be set to `false` to omit the auto fullscreen. Defaults to `auto`.
